news.content: [Sep. 2017] Our paper "Evaluation of Demand Side Management over Pricing Competition of Multiple Suppliers having Heterogeneous Energy Sources" has been accepted for publication in Energies
[Oct. 2017] Our paper "Event-Driven Energy Trading System in Microgrids: Aperiodic Market Model Analysis with a Game Theoretic Approach" has been accepted for publication in IEEE Access
[Oct. 2017] Our paper "Learning-based Adaptive Imputation Method with kNN algorithm for Missing Power Data" has been accepted for publication in Energies
[Nov. 2017] Our paper "Competitive Partial Computation Offloading for Maximizing Energy Efficiency in Mobile Cloud Computing" has been accepted for publication in IEEE Access

[Nov. 2017] My paper "Multi-homing in Heterogeneous Wireless Access Networks: A Stackelberg Game for Pricing" has been accepted for publication in KSII Transactions on Internet and Information Systems
